name: Pit of several dozen skeletons
description:
Oh no! You have fallen into the Pit of Several Dozen Skeletons! Let's see how many skeletons you can hit with your stick before you become a skeleton yourself.

WASD or arrows to move. Space to swing sword. E to fire arrows.

Tiles: https://palehand.itch.io/2d-ortho-set-template

Skulls: https://frodoundead.itch.io/skull-bones

Created for the Stop Waiting For Godot Jam.
